reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed two nights at the Litohoro Olympus Resort Villas & Spa. The hotel is extremely nice looking, the room was very comfortable and we had a beautiful view of Mount Olympus. We were situated in the very first room next to reception and there was absolutely no problem at all with noise, the room was well sound proofed.
reviews.title: Looks Nice, Shame About The Rest

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The downside was: wifi only works on mobile phones and intermittently. Both my husband and I couldn't connect out laptops. We guessed that the hotel disabled laptops from connecting so people can't download a lot. Annoying but fair enough if they have had problems or limited internet connectivity.
reviews.title: Mediocrity !!!

reviews.text: Breakfast was a wide choice but very low quality. A number of items looked as though they were left from dinner the night before. This is the first hotel I've been to where they have served chips at breakfast!
reviews.title: Relaxing hotel near mt Olympus

reviews.text: They have a spa room which is a private area that you have to book. They had plenty of availability but the jacuzzi was very cold so I didn't go in.
reviews.title: Interesting hotel

reviews.text: Lots of seating by the pool and right by the sea for the beach. The whole area is very well kept.
reviews.title: a small paradise without service....
